assignments.instructions:
1. Write your name and the title of the assignment on the top of your paper.

2. Workout the problems on paper the same way we always did. Use dark pen or dark pencil for contrast, that way your uploaded document will be easier to read.

3. Check your work. You will find the answers in Files in folder "HW files and Answer files". Assign points and do corrections in different color.

4. Add your points and write the number of achieved points over the total number of points on top of the page in color.

5. Upload one document.
